headline: HCA Healthcare Aligns Nursing Leadership With $10b Buyback And Dividend Plan
summary: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) promoted Erica Rossitto to Chief Nurse Executive, expanding her role over the nursing workforce and patient care strategy across the system. The company announced a new $10b share repurchase authorization and raised its quarterly dividend, indicating how it currently prioritizes capital returns to shareholders. These moves were released together as part of a broader update on leadership and capital allocation decisions. HCA Healthcare operates a large network of...

headline: HCA Healthcare Hospitals Named on America’s 50 Best Hospitals List for 2026 by Healthgrades
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., January 29, 2026--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that three of its hospitals were named among America’s 50 Best Hospitals and 15 of its hospitals were named among America’s 100 Best Hospitals by Healthgrades. These are part of the 44 HCA Healthcare hospitals recognized on the Healthgrades America’s 250 Best Hospitals list for 2026. Inclusion on these lists recognizes superior performance in providing care for c

headline: HCA could lose $1B from ACA subsidy lapse, Medicaid state payment decline
summary: The for-profit hospital operator said it’s implementing a multi-year resilience plan to offset losses. Still, HCA anticipates its full-year earnings this year will skew closely to or exceed 2025 figures.

content.title: HCA could lose $1B from ACA subsidy lapse, Medicaid state payment decline
content.summary: The for-profit hospital operator said it’s implementing a multi-year resilience plan to offset losses. Still, HCA anticipates its full-year earnings this year will skew closely to or exceed 2025 figures.

thumbnail.caption: HCA Healthcare and Tenet Healthcare shareholders voted to reject proposals that would strengthen reporting requirements about risks posed by providing abortion services in states with abortion bans.
